business.name: Dynasurf (UK) Ltd
business.description: Dynasurf specializes in hard chrome plating, cylindrical grinding, and cylinder tube honing services for industrial applications.
unique_value_propositions: Over 50 years of precision engineering expertise since 1971
Purpose-built modern facility in Sandbach, Cheshire
Rapid turnaround times with express service available
Capacity to hone tubes up to 300mm diameter and 2.2 meters length
ISO quality standards and industry-leading precision
business.tone_of_voice: Professional, technical, customer-focused with emphasis on precision, quality, and reliability
